extension.name: org.apache.nifi.db.schemaregistry.DatabaseTableSchemaRegistry
extension.description: Provides a service for generating a record schema from a database table definition. The service is configured to use a table name and a database connection fetches the table metadata (i.e. table definition) such as column names, data types, nullability, etc.

property.name: Database Connection Pooling Service
property.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain a connection to the database for retrieving table information.

property.name: Catalog Name
property.description: The name of the catalog used to locate the desired table. This may not apply for the database that you are querying. In this case, leave the field empty. Note that if the property is set and the database is case-sensitive, the catalog name must match the database's catalog name exactly.

property.name: Schema Name
property.description: The name of the schema that the table belongs to. This may not apply for the database that you are updating. In this case, leave the field empty. Note that if the property is set and the database is case-sensitive, the schema name must match the database's schema name exactly. Also notice that if the same table name exists in multiple schemas and Schema Name is not specified, the service will find those tables and give an error if the different tables have the same column name(s).
